_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CATGPENREL_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, SEQUENCE VARCHAR(4000), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CATGPENREL_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT DISTINCT CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID, rtrim(cast(catgpenrel.catalog_id as char(23))) ||'_'|| rtrim(cast(CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID as char(23))) ||'_'|| rtrim(cast(cast(catgpenrel.sequence as decimal(20,5)) as char(26))) SEQUENCE FROM CATGPENREL, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE, TI_CGPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CD WHERE CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATGROUP_ID = CD.CATGROUP_ID AND CD.PUBLISHED IN (?unpublished?, ?published?) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CATENTREL WHERE CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CATRELTYPE_ID ='PRODUCT_ITEM')) UNION( SELECT DISTINCT X.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD CATENTRY_ID, rtrim(cast(GP.CATALOG_ID as char(23))) ||'_'|| rtrim(cast(GP.CATGROUP_ID as char(23))) ||'_'|| rtrim(cast(cast(GP.SEQUENCE as decimal(20,5)) as char(26))) SEQUENCE FROM CATGPENREL GP, TI_CGPUB_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CD, (SELECT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT,CATENTRY_ID_CHILD FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#,CATENTREL WHERE CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTTYPE_ID='ItemBean' AND CATRELTYPE_ID='PRODUCT_ITEM') X WHERE GP.CATGROUP_ID = CD.CATGROUP_ID AND CD.PUBLISHED IN (?unpublished?, ?published?) AND GP.CATENTRY_ID=X.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID ) ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_DPCATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATENTRY_PARENT VARCHAR(1024), ITEM_SEQUENCE DECIMAL(20, 5), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_DPCATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTRY_ID_CHILD, CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, R.SEQUENCE I_SEQ FROM CATENTREL R, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# C WHERE R.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD = C.CATENTRY_ID AND R.CATRELTYPE_ID = 'PRODUCT_ITEM' ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID_CHILD

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_DCCATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATENTRY_CHILD BIGINT, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_DCCATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT ,CATENTRY_ID_CHILD FROM CATENTREL, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# WHERE CATENTRY_ID_PARENT = CATENTRY_ID AND CATENTRY_ID_PARENT IN (SELECT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT FROM CATENTREL INNER JOIN TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# ON (CATENTRY_ID_PARENT = CATENTRY_ID) WHERE CATRELTYPE_ID = 'PRODUCT_ITEM' GROUP BY CATENTRY_ID_PARENT HAVING COUNT(CATENTRY_ID_PARENT)=1) ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID_PARENT

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_COMPONENTS_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, COMPONENTS VARCHAR(4000), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_COMPONENTS_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, rtrim(cast(CATENTRY_ID_CHILD as char(26))) ||'/_/'|| rtrim(cast(cast(COALESCE(QUANTITY,0) as decimal(20,5)) as char(26))) COMPONENTS, CATENTREL.SEQUENCE SEQUENCE FROM CATENTREL,TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# WHERE CATRELTYPE_ID in ('PACKAGE_COMPONENT','BUNDLE_COMPONENT','DK_PDK','PDK_COMPONENT') AND CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT=TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#.CATENTRY_ID) UNION (SELECT TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID_PARENT, rtrim(cast(DKPDCCOMPLIST.CATENTRY_ID as char(26))) ||'/_/'|| rtrim(cast(cast(COALESCE(DKPDCCOMPLIST.QUANTITY,0) as decimal(20,5)) as char(26))) ||'/_/'|| rtrim(cast(DKPDCCOMPLIST.DKPREDEFCONF_ID as char(26))) ||'/_/'|| rtrim(cast(DKPDCCOMPLIST.DKPDCCOMPLIST_ID as char(26)))||'/_/'|| rtrim(cast(DKPDCCOMPLIST.GROUPNAME as char(26))) COMPONENTS, DKPDCCOMPLIST.SEQUENCE SEQUENCE FROM DKPDCCATENTREL INNER JOIN TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# ON (TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#.CATENTRY_ID=DKPDCCATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID) INNER JOIN DKPDCCOMPLIST ON (DKPDCCOMPLIST.DKPREDEFCONF_ID=DKPDCCATENTREL.DKPREDEFCONF_ID)) ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID_PARENT,SEQUENCE

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_PDK_DK_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID_PDK BIGINT NOT NULL, CATENTRY_ID_DK BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID_PDK))
_config:table.name: TI_PDK_DK_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTRY_ID_CHILD, CATENTRY_ID_PARENT FROM CATENTREL,TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# WHERE CATRELTYPE_ID='DK_PDK' AND CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD=TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#.CATENTRY_ID ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID_CHILD

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_GROUPING_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, GROUPING BIGINT, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_GROUPING_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: (SELECT CATENTRY_ID,CATENTRY_ID_PARENT FROM CATENTREL R, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# C WHERE R.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD = C.CATENTRY_ID AND R.CATRELTYPE_ID = 'PRODUCT_ITEM') UNION (SELECT CATENTRY_ID, CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID_PARENT FROM TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# WHERE CATENTTYPE_ID in ('ProductBean', 'PackageBean','BundleBean','DynamicKitBean', 'PredDynaKitBean')) UNION (SELECT CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID, CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID_PARENT FROM CATGPENREL INNER JOIN TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# ON (TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#.CATENTRY_ID=CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID) LEFT JOIN CATENTREL ON (CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID = CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD) WHERE TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#.CATENTTYPE_ID='ItemBean' AND CATALOG_ID=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID# AND CATENTREL.CATENTRY_ID_CHILD IS NULL) ORDER BY CATENTRY_ID
